metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Bound Together is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Bound Together has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Major,  and G Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
